org.torpedoquery.jpa

Interface Query<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComparableFunction<T>, Function<T>, Selector<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    QueryBuilder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultQueryBuilder

    public interface Query<T>
extends ComparableFunction<T>
    Query is the result of the Torpedo.select() You can retreive the data with methods get and list or access to HQL String with getQuery and the related parameters with getParameters()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
      Use only when your query is suppose to return only one element
      Map<String,Object> getParameters() 
      String getQuery() 
      List<T> list(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
      Execute and return your query data
      <E> List<E> map(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager, PostFunction<E,T> function)
      Retrieve the query data and apply a transformation function on each elements
      Query<T> setFirstResult(int startPosition)
      Set the position of the first result to retrieve.
      Query<T> setMaxResults(int maxResult)
      Set the maximum number of results to retrieve.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.torpedoquery.jpa.Function

        getProxy

      • Methods inherited from interface org.torpedoquery.jpa.internal.Selector

        createQueryFragment, generateParameter
